info.name: Feedly Like Old Google Reader
info.description:
Version 0.1.1 Beta
----------
Use this style to get old Google Reader style back in feedly.
- Fixed feed sidebar
- Better compatibility in Right-to-Left languages like Persian,Arabic, Hebrew and Urdu
----------
/* if you find bugs or have any ideas and suggestions, let me know :) */
info.additionalInfo:
2013/07/01 | Add "Tahoma" font to RTL contents & some style fixes
2013/06/30 | Release v0.1 Beta
------------
Next Version : 
Improve style in different views (Magazine,Cards,Full Article) - 
Cross browser Compatibility
